problem_names:
lemma zero_not_in_nonzero:
"\<zero>\<^bsub>R\<^esub> \<notin> nonzero R"

lemma(in domain) nonzero_memI:
  assumes "a \<in> carrier R"
  assumes "a \<noteq> \<zero>"
  shows "a \<in> nonzero R"

lemma(in domain) nonzero_memE:
  assumes "a \<in> nonzero R"
  shows "a \<in> carrier R" "a \<noteq>\<zero>"

lemma(in domain) not_nonzero_memE:
  assumes "a \<notin> nonzero R"
  assumes "a \<in> carrier R"
  shows "a = \<zero>"

lemma(in domain) not_nonzero_memI:
  assumes "a = \<zero>"
  shows "a \<notin> nonzero R"

lemma(in domain) nonzero_closed:
  assumes "a \<in> nonzero R"
  shows "a \<in> carrier R"

lemma(in domain) nonzero_mult_in_car:
  assumes "a \<in> nonzero R"
  assumes "b \<in> nonzero R"
  shows "a \<otimes> b \<in> carrier R"

lemma(in domain) nonzero_mult_closed:
  assumes "a \<in> nonzero R"
  assumes "b \<in> nonzero R"
  shows "a \<otimes> b \<in> nonzero R"

lemma(in domain) nonzero_one_closed:
"\<one> \<in> nonzero R"

lemma(in domain) one_nonzero:
"\<one> \<in> nonzero R"

lemma(in domain) nat_pow_nonzero:
  assumes "x \<in>nonzero R"
  shows "x[^](n::nat) \<in> nonzero R"

lemma(in monoid) Units_int_pow_closed:
  assumes "x \<in> Units G"
  shows "x[^](n::int) \<in> Units G"

lemma(in comm_monoid) UnitsI:
  assumes "a \<in> carrier G"
  assumes "b \<in> carrier G"
  assumes "a \<otimes> b = \<one>"
  shows "a \<in> Units G" "b \<in> Units G"

lemma(in comm_monoid) is_invI:
  assumes "a \<in> carrier G"
  assumes "b \<in> carrier G"
  assumes "a \<otimes> b = \<one>"
  shows "inv\<^bsub>G\<^esub> b = a" "inv\<^bsub>G\<^esub> a = b"

lemma(in ring) ring_in_Units_imp_not_zero:
  assumes "\<one> \<noteq> \<zero>"
  assumes "a \<in> Units R"
  shows "a \<noteq> \<zero>"

lemma(in ring) Units_nonzero:
  assumes "u \<in> Units R"
  assumes "\<one>\<^bsub>R\<^esub> \<noteq> \<zero>\<^bsub>R\<^esub>"
  shows "u \<in> nonzero R"

lemma(in ring) Units_inverse:
  assumes "u \<in> Units R"
  shows "inv u \<in> Units R"

lemma(in cring) invI:  
  assumes "x \<in> carrier R"
  assumes "y \<in> carrier R"
  assumes "x \<otimes>\<^bsub>R\<^esub> y = \<one>\<^bsub>R\<^esub>"
  shows "y = inv \<^bsub>R\<^esub> x"
        "x = inv \<^bsub>R\<^esub> y"

lemma(in cring) inv_cancelR:
  assumes "x \<in> Units R"
  assumes "y \<in> carrier R"
  assumes "z \<in> carrier R"
  assumes "y = x \<otimes>\<^bsub>R\<^esub> z"
  shows "inv\<^bsub>R\<^esub> x \<otimes>\<^bsub>R\<^esub> y = z"
        "y \<otimes>\<^bsub>R\<^esub> (inv\<^bsub>R\<^esub> x)  = z"

lemma(in cring) inv_cancelL:
  assumes "x \<in> Units R"
  assumes "y \<in> carrier R"
  assumes "z \<in> carrier R"
  assumes "y = z \<otimes>\<^bsub>R\<^esub> x"
  shows "inv\<^bsub>R\<^esub> x \<otimes>\<^bsub>R\<^esub> y = z"
        "y \<otimes>\<^bsub>R\<^esub> (inv\<^bsub>R\<^esub> x)  = z"
translations:
lemma zero_not_in_nonzero:
"\<zero>\<^bsub>R\<^esub> \<notin> nonzero R"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<zero>\<^bsub>R\<^esub> \<notin> nonzero R
unfolding nonzero_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<zero>\<^bsub>R\<^esub>
    \<notin> {a \<in> carrier R. a \<noteq> \<zero>\<^bsub>R\<^esub>}
by blast

lemma(in domain) nonzero_memI:
  assumes "a \<in> carrier R"
  assumes "a \<noteq> \<zero>"
  shows "a \<in> nonzero R"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a \<in> nonzero R
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  a \<in> carrier R
  a \<noteq> \<zero>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a \<in> nonzero R
by(simp add: nonzero_def)

lemma(in domain) nonzero_memE:
  assumes "a \<in> nonzero R"
  shows "a \<in> carrier R" "a \<noteq>\<zero>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a \<in> carrier R &&& a \<noteq> \<zero>
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  a \<in> nonzero R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a \<in> carrier R &&& a \<noteq> \<zero>
by(auto simp: nonzero_def)

lemma(in domain) not_nonzero_memE:
  assumes "a \<notin> nonzero R"
  assumes "a \<in> carrier R"
  shows "a = \<zero>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a = \<zero>
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  a \<notin> nonzero R
  a \<in> carrier R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a = \<zero>
by (simp add: nonzero_def)

lemma(in domain) not_nonzero_memI:
  assumes "a = \<zero>"
  shows "a \<notin> nonzero R"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a \<notin> nonzero R
using assms nonzero_memE(2)

proof (prove)
using this:
  a = \<zero>
  ?a \<in> nonzero R \<Longrightarrow> ?a \<noteq> \<zero>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a \<notin> nonzero R
by auto

lemma(in domain) nonzero_closed:
  assumes "a \<in> nonzero R"
  shows "a \<in> carrier R"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a \<in> carrier R
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  a \<in> nonzero R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a \<in> carrier R
by (simp add: nonzero_def)

lemma(in domain) nonzero_mult_in_car:
  assumes "a \<in> nonzero R"
  assumes "b \<in> nonzero R"
  shows "a \<otimes> b \<in> carrier R"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a \<otimes> b \<in> carrier R
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  a \<in> nonzero R
  b \<in> nonzero R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a \<otimes> b \<in> carrier R
by (simp add: nonzero_def)

lemma(in domain) nonzero_mult_closed:
  assumes "a \<in> nonzero R"
  assumes "b \<in> nonzero R"
  shows "a \<otimes> b \<in> nonzero R"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a \<otimes> b \<in> nonzero R
apply(rule nonzero_memI)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. a \<otimes> b \<in> carrier R
 2. a \<otimes> b \<noteq> \<zero>
using assms nonzero_memE

proof (prove)
using this:
  a \<in> nonzero R
  b \<in> nonzero R
  ?a \<in> nonzero R \<Longrightarrow> ?a \<in> carrier R
  ?a \<in> nonzero R \<Longrightarrow> ?a \<noteq> \<zero>

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. a \<otimes> b \<in> carrier R
 2. a \<otimes> b \<noteq> \<zero>
apply blast

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a \<otimes> b \<noteq> \<zero>
using assms nonzero_memE

proof (prove)
using this:
  a \<in> nonzero R
  b \<in> nonzero R
  ?a \<in> nonzero R \<Longrightarrow> ?a \<in> carrier R
  ?a \<in> nonzero R \<Longrightarrow> ?a \<noteq> \<zero>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a \<otimes> b \<noteq> \<zero>
by (simp add: integral_iff)

lemma(in domain) nonzero_one_closed:
"\<one> \<in> nonzero R"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<one> \<in> nonzero R
by (simp add: nonzero_def)

lemma(in domain) one_nonzero:
"\<one> \<in> nonzero R"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<one> \<in> nonzero R
by (simp add: nonzero_one_closed)

lemma(in domain) nat_pow_nonzero:
  assumes "x \<in>nonzero R"
  shows "x[^](n::nat) \<in> nonzero R"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x [^] n \<in> nonzero R
unfolding nonzero_def
apply(induction n)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. x [^] 0 \<in> {a \<in> carrier R. a \<noteq> \<zero>}
 2. \<And>n.
       x [^] n
       \<in> {a \<in> carrier R. a \<noteq> \<zero>} \<Longrightarrow>
       x [^] Suc n \<in> {a \<in> carrier R. a \<noteq> \<zero>}
using assms integral_iff nonzero_closed zero_not_in_nonzero

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<in> nonzero R
  \<lbrakk>?a \<in> carrier R; ?b \<in> carrier R\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> (?a \<otimes> ?b = \<zero>) =
                    (?a = \<zero> \<or> ?b = \<zero>)
  ?a \<in> nonzero R \<Longrightarrow> ?a \<in> carrier R
  \<zero>\<^bsub>?R\<^esub> \<notin> nonzero ?R

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. x [^] 0 \<in> {a \<in> carrier R. a \<noteq> \<zero>}
 2. \<And>n.
       x [^] n
       \<in> {a \<in> carrier R. a \<noteq> \<zero>} \<Longrightarrow>
       x [^] Suc n \<in> {a \<in> carrier R. a \<noteq> \<zero>}
by auto

lemma(in monoid) Units_int_pow_closed:
  assumes "x \<in> Units G"
  shows "x[^](n::int) \<in> Units G"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x [^] n \<in> Units G
by (metis Units_pow_closed assms int_pow_def2 monoid.Units_inv_Units monoid_axioms)

lemma(in comm_monoid) UnitsI:
  assumes "a \<in> carrier G"
  assumes "b \<in> carrier G"
  assumes "a \<otimes> b = \<one>"
  shows "a \<in> Units G" "b \<in> Units G"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a \<in> Units G &&& b \<in> Units G
unfolding Units_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a \<in> {y \<in> carrier G.
             \<exists>x\<in>carrier G.
                x \<otimes> y = \<one> \<and> y \<otimes> x = \<one>} &&&
    b \<in> {y \<in> carrier G.
             \<exists>x\<in>carrier G.
                x \<otimes> y = \<one> \<and> y \<otimes> x = \<one>}
using comm_monoid_axioms_def assms m_comm[of a b]

proof (prove)
using this:
  Group.comm_monoid_axioms ?G \<equiv>
  \<forall>x y.
     x \<in> carrier ?G \<longrightarrow>
     y \<in> carrier ?G \<longrightarrow>
     x \<otimes>\<^bsub>?G\<^esub> y = y \<otimes>\<^bsub>?G\<^esub> x
  a \<in> carrier G
  b \<in> carrier G
  a \<otimes> b = \<one>
  \<lbrakk>a \<in> carrier G; b \<in> carrier G\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> a \<otimes> b = b \<otimes> a

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a \<in> {y \<in> carrier G.
             \<exists>x\<in>carrier G.
                x \<otimes> y = \<one> \<and> y \<otimes> x = \<one>} &&&
    b \<in> {y \<in> carrier G.
             \<exists>x\<in>carrier G.
                x \<otimes> y = \<one> \<and> y \<otimes> x = \<one>}
by auto

lemma(in comm_monoid) is_invI:
  assumes "a \<in> carrier G"
  assumes "b \<in> carrier G"
  assumes "a \<otimes> b = \<one>"
  shows "inv\<^bsub>G\<^esub> b = a" "inv\<^bsub>G\<^esub> a = b"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inv b = a &&& inv a = b
using assms inv_char m_comm

proof (prove)
using this:
  a \<in> carrier G
  b \<in> carrier G
  a \<otimes> b = \<one>
  \<lbrakk>?x \<in> carrier G; ?y \<in> carrier G; ?x \<otimes> ?y = \<one>;
   ?y \<otimes> ?x = \<one>\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> inv ?x = ?y
  \<lbrakk>?x \<in> carrier G; ?y \<in> carrier G\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?x \<otimes> ?y = ?y \<otimes> ?x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inv b = a &&& inv a = b
by auto

lemma(in ring) ring_in_Units_imp_not_zero:
  assumes "\<one> \<noteq> \<zero>"
  assumes "a \<in> Units R"
  shows "a \<noteq> \<zero>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a \<noteq> \<zero>
using assms monoid.Units_l_cancel

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<one> \<noteq> \<zero>
  a \<in> Units R
  \<lbrakk>Group.monoid ?G; ?x \<in> Units ?G; ?y \<in> carrier ?G;
   ?z \<in> carrier ?G\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> (?x \<otimes>\<^bsub>?G\<^esub> ?y =
                     ?x \<otimes>\<^bsub>?G\<^esub> ?z) =
                    (?y = ?z)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a \<noteq> \<zero>
by (metis l_null  monoid_axioms one_closed zero_closed)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. u \<in> nonzero R

proof (prove)

 1. u \<in> carrier R
using Units_closed assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?x \<in> Units R \<Longrightarrow> ?x \<in> carrier R
  u \<in> Units R
  \<one> \<noteq> \<zero>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. u \<in> carrier R

  u \<in> carrier R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. u \<in> nonzero R
have "u \<noteq>\<zero>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):

using Units_r_inv_ex assms(1) assms(2)

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?x \<in> Units R \<Longrightarrow>
  \<exists>y\<in>carrier R. ?x \<otimes> y = \<one>
  u \<in> Units R
  \<one> \<noteq> \<zero>

goal (1 subgoal):

  u \<noteq> \<zero>

goal (1 subgoal):

No subgoals!

lemma(in ring) Units_inverse:
  assumes "u \<in> Units R"
  shows "inv u \<in> Units R"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inv u \<in> Units R
by (simp add: assms)

lemma(in cring) invI:  
  assumes "x \<in> carrier R"
  assumes "y \<in> carrier R"
  assumes "x \<otimes>\<^bsub>R\<^esub> y = \<one>\<^bsub>R\<^esub>"
  shows "y = inv \<^bsub>R\<^esub> x"
        "x = inv \<^bsub>R\<^esub> y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. y = inv x &&& x = inv y
using assms(1) assms(2) assms(3) is_invI

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<in> carrier R
  y \<in> carrier R
  x \<otimes> y = \<one>
  \<lbrakk>?a \<in> carrier R; ?b \<in> carrier R;
   ?a \<otimes> ?b = \<one>\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> inv ?b = ?a
  \<lbrakk>?a \<in> carrier R; ?b \<in> carrier R;
   ?a \<otimes> ?b = \<one>\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> inv ?a = ?b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. y = inv x &&& x = inv y
by auto

lemma(in cring) inv_cancelR:
  assumes "x \<in> Units R"
  assumes "y \<in> carrier R"
  assumes "z \<in> carrier R"
  assumes "y = x \<otimes>\<^bsub>R\<^esub> z"
  shows "inv\<^bsub>R\<^esub> x \<otimes>\<^bsub>R\<^esub> y = z"
        "y \<otimes>\<^bsub>R\<^esub> (inv\<^bsub>R\<^esub> x)  = z"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inv x \<otimes> y = z &&& y \<otimes> inv x = z

apply (metis Units_closed assms(1) assms(3) assms(4) cring.cring_simprules(12) 
    is_cring m_assoc monoid.Units_inv_closed monoid.Units_l_inv monoid_axioms)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. y \<otimes> inv x = z

by (metis Units_closed assms(1) assms(3) assms(4) m_assoc m_comm monoid.Units_inv_closed 
      monoid.Units_r_inv monoid.r_one monoid_axioms)

lemma(in cring) inv_cancelL:
  assumes "x \<in> Units R"
  assumes "y \<in> carrier R"
  assumes "z \<in> carrier R"
  assumes "y = z \<otimes>\<^bsub>R\<^esub> x"
  shows "inv\<^bsub>R\<^esub> x \<otimes>\<^bsub>R\<^esub> y = z"
        "y \<otimes>\<^bsub>R\<^esub> (inv\<^bsub>R\<^esub> x)  = z"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. inv x \<otimes> y = z &&& y \<otimes> inv x = z
apply (simp add: Units_closed assms(1) assms(3) assms(4) m_lcomm)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. y \<otimes> inv x = z
by (simp add: Units_closed assms(1) assms(3) assms(4) m_assoc)
end
